  • Constructor Details

    • VoltageSound

      public VoltageSound​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, VoltageModule module)
      Constructor Sounds will default to be resampled to the internal sample rate of 48kHz.
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      displayName - display name of the control.
      module - the module this belongs to.

    • VoltageSound

      public VoltageSound​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module)
      Constructor Sounds will default to be resampled to the internal sample rate of 48kHz.
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • Play

      public void Play()
      Plays the sound. This actually plays the sound through the I/O Panel.

    • SeekToStart

      public boolean SeekToStart()
      Seek to the beginning of the sound.
      Returns:
      true if seeks to the beginning.

    • LoadFromMemory

      public boolean LoadFromMemory​(byte[] data)
      Load a sound from memory.
      Parameters:
      data - a buffer of a sound file, not audio data. The formats supported are OGG, MP3, WAV and AIFF.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • LoadFromFile

      public boolean LoadFromFile​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Load a sound from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the location of the file. The formats supported are OGG, MP3, WAV and AIFF.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • LoadFromResource

      public boolean LoadFromResource​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Load a sound from the module's resources.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - the location of the file. The formats supported are OGG, MP3, WAV and AIFF. Embed a sound file as a resource using Module Designer.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • LoadAudioData

      public boolean LoadAudioData​(float[] leftSamples, float[] rightSamples, int numSamples, int sampleRate)
      Load a sound from audio data.
      Parameters:
      leftSamples - a buffer of samples representing the left channel.
      rightSamples - a buffer of samples representing the right channel.
      numSamples - the number of samples that the buffers hold.
      sampleRate - the sample rate of the data.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • GetMetaDataValue

      public java.lang.String GetMetaDataValue​(java.lang.String key)
      Reads a meta data value in a file.
      Parameters:
      key - can be a special chunk in the file. It depends on the file format. Some valid keys include: ENCODER, TITLE, ARTIST, ALBUM, COMMENT, DATE, GENRE, TRACKNUMBER,NumCuePoints, NumCueNotes, NumCueLabels, Cue(N)Identifier, Cue(N)Offset, CueLabel(N)Identifier, CueLabel(N)Text, CueNote(N)TimeStamp, CueNote(N)Identifier, CueNote(N)Text where (N) is the a number. INST, basc, cate
      Returns:
      the value meta data if it exists.

    • ReadSamples

      public int ReadSamples​(int numSamples, float[] leftSamples, float[] rightSamples)
      Read samples from the sound.
      Parameters:
      numSamples - the number of samples to read.
      leftSamples - a buffer to receive the left channel samples.
      rightSamples - a buffer to receive the right channel samples.
      Returns:
      the number of samples read.

    • NumSamples

      public int NumSamples()
      Returns the number of samples in the sound.
      Returns:
      the number of samples.

    • SampleRate

      public double SampleRate()

    • SetResampling

      public void SetResampling​(boolean bResample)
      Sets the samples to be resampled to the internal Voltage Modular sample rate of 48,000 Hz.
      Parameters:
      bResample - set to true to turn on resampling.

    • IsStereo

      public boolean IsStereo()
      Is the sound stereo?
      Returns:
      true if it's successful.

    • CurrentOffset

      public int CurrentOffset()
      Get the current offset.
      Returns:
      the current offset of the sound.

    • SeekTo

      public boolean SeekTo​(int sampleOffset)
      Seek to a sample offset.
      Parameters:
      sampleOffset - the offset to seek to.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • Looping

      public boolean Looping()
      Is the sound looping?
      Returns:
      true if looping.

    • SetLooping

      public void SetLooping​(boolean bLoop)
      Set the sound to loop.
      Parameters:
      bLoop - set to true to loop the sound.

    • IsPlaying

      public boolean IsPlaying()
      Is it currently playing?
      Returns:
      true if playing now.

    • Play

      public void Play​(boolean bDeleteWhenDone)
      Play the sound and optionally delete it when done.
      Parameters:
      bDeleteWhenDone - set to true to have the sound deleted upon completion. Use to play it and forget about it.

    • Stop

      public void Stop()
      Stops a sound.
